Instruction for Using GUANACO
==============================

.. image:: ../assets/configguanaco.png
   :width: 100

In this section, we describe how to create a configuration file and run GUANACO using both the Python package and Docker versions, on a local machine as well as on a server.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   configuring-json
   running-python
   running-docker
